features.discovery: AI Model Trend Tracking Across Platforms

step1.title: Data Aggregation
step1.description: We monitor major AI platforms, collecting data on model releases, updates, and usage metrics.

step2.title: Analysis & Processing
step2.description: Our system analyzes model performance, user engagement, and trends to identify relevant and impactful models.

step3.title: Insight Delivery
step3.description: We provide curated lists and insights to help you discover models tailored to your needs.

fragmented.title: Fragmented Model Discovery
fragmented.description: Finding the right AI model is difficult with options scattered across platforms.
fragmented.solutionDescription: A unified platform with a comprehensive model library and advanced search.

metrics.title: Lack of Standardized Metrics
metrics.description: Comparing models is challenging due to varying metrics across platforms.
metrics.solutionDescription: Standardized scoring and clear performance indicators with trend analysis.

time.title: Time-Consuming Research
time.description: Keeping up with new models and updates requires constant monitoring.
time.solutionDescription: Automated tracking and curation of new and trending models, saving you time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does Model Guru collect model data?
faq.a1: We aggregate data from publicly available APIs and information provided by various platforms. We update our data regularly to ensure accuracy and timeliness. See our Methodology for details.
faq.q2: Does Model Guru offer API access?
faq.a2: API access is not currently available but is planned for future development. Premium users will get priority access when launched. Please contact us if you are interested.
faq.q3: How often is the data updated?
faq.a3: We update our data daily to provide the latest information on AI models across platforms.
faq.q4: Can I suggest a new platform to track?
faq.a4: Absolutely! We are always looking to expand our coverage. Please contact us with your suggestions.
